title: DOES THE GEM STONE BUNDLE COME WITH GEMSTONE??
body:
Only see Hex chest + key and Icon under BUNDLE CONTAINS THE FOLLOWING ITEMS:

For example, Splendid Bundle is sold for 1050 RP and total value is only 500 RP.

replies.body: You can only buy each bundle once, but you can in fact buy each bundle for a grand total of 3 gemstones ^_^
Just tried it with the "splenderous" bundle (I like the Pengu icon either way) and it does come with a gemstone.  I assume that they all do.  One purchase only.
